select ffa.id as applyId,fc.companyName,ffp.title as productName,ffp.financeType,ffp.mechanism,ffa.createdTime,ffa.status from fc_finance_apply ffa,fc_company fc,fc_finance_product ffp where ffa.companyId = fc.id and ffa.productId = ffp.id
and ( fc.companyName like concat('%',#{param.companyOrProductName},'%') or ffp.title like concat('%',#{param.companyOrProductName},'%') )
order by ffa.status asc

select ffa.id as applyId,fc.companyName,ffp.title as productName,ffp.financeType,ffp.mechanism,ffa.createdTime,ffa.status,ffa.remark from fc_finance_apply ffa,fc_company fc,fc_finance_product ffp where ffa.companyId = fc.id and ffa.productId = ffp.id and ffa.id = #{applyId}
